oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Real photo postcard of Bad Bertrich, Germany from Major Bernard Edwin Ragland to his wife, Estella Finley Ragland
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Major Bernard Edwin Ragland (1894-1963) served in the Dentist Corps and was a member of the Medical Detachment of the 155 Inf. Regt., 39th Div. during World War I. This postcard, sent by Major Ragland to his wife, Estella Finley Ragland, depicts the town of Bad Bertrich, Germany where Major Ragland was stationed after the war.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
